message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I believe I can't afford $15,000 at this time. I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product. I hope this is within your consideration.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to get a bit closer to my initial asking price.  How about $14,000? It's still a great deal considering the value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $13,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
